com.reportmill.text

Class RMTextLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
        • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double
          • com.reportmill.text.RMTextRun
            • com.reportmill.text.RMTextLine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.CharSequence, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class RMTextLine
extends RMTextRun
    A class to represent a line of text in a layout.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
